display_title.display_title:
Mali – Projet agricole pour la
            région sud du Mali : Mali - Projet agricole dans le Mali-Sud

docna.cdata!: Mali - Projet Agricole Dans le Mali-Sud

subtopic: Crops and Crop Management Systems,Environmental Economics & Policies,Economic Theory & Research,Agricultural Knowledge and Information Systems,Agricultural Research

0.cdata!: Mali - Projet Agricole Dans le Mali-Sud

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Mali-Sud Agriculture
            Development Project's objectives will be: expanding
            cotton, maize, rice and kenaf production mainly through the
            intensification of improved cultivation methods; providing
            project farmers with technical advice, seed multiplication
            facilities applied research and credit; improving animal
            husbandry of cotton farmers; expanding cotton processing
            facilities, improvement of kenaf settling ponds,
            construction of a rice mill, provision of storage for inputs
            procurement of vehicles for CHDT and improvement of
            agricultural tracks; undertaking studies for the future
            development of the areas freed from onchocerciasis;
            improving the rural health services in the area; and
            training of CHDT staff, and of the rural population through
            young farmers and blacksmith's training and a
            functional literacy program.
